name: BIG YAM, The Parsons Agency
description:
Owned by American entrepreneur and philanthropist Bob Parsons, BIG YAM is an advertising agency made up of some of the brightest, smartest and boldest talent in the industry.
BIG YAM is driven by a passion to produce measurable results that 'ring the register' for our clients by providing a full range of marketing solutions including traditional and digital advertising, social media and public relations.
